headline.main: SHARP U.S. ACTION ON FRANCO SHAPING; Congratulatory Message to Japanese Philippine Puppet Brings Issues to a Climax POLICY CHANGE INDICATED Hardening, Linked to Moscow Pacts, Held Bad Augury for Other Axis Sympathizers

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 2 -- The United States Government is "giving serious consideration" to the action of the Franco regime a week ago in sending a message of congratulation to Jose P. Laurel, head of the Japanese puppet government in the Philippines.
abstract: Krock comment on Sen reaction to Moscow pact
snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 2 -- The United States Government is "giving serious consideration" to the action of the Franco regime a week ago in sending a message of congratulation to Jose P. Laurel, head of the Japanese puppet government in the Philippines....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
